pullrequest.title: PresetManager Part 2: command line, SDF generation, unit test

content.raw: I made some in tweaks in e943518 to improve branch coverage and caught some mistakes, dead code, etc. In particular, I decided to get rid of `Preset::Name(const std::string&` because I realized that it's a bad idea to change the name of a preset without changing its SDF or its key in the `PresetManager` storage. I also made `PresetManager::ProfileSDF(Preset, sdf::ElementPtr)` return a bool and added more error checking, and changed some internal checks to GZ_ASSERTS.
content.html: I made some in tweaks in e943518 to improve branch coverage and caught some mistakes, dead code, etc. In particular, I decided to get rid of Preset::Name(const std::string& because I realized that it's a bad idea to change the name of a preset without changing its SDF or its key in the PresetManager storage. I also made PresetManager::ProfileSDF(Preset, sdf::ElementPtr) return a bool and added more error checking, and changed some internal checks to GZ_ASSERTS.
